result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Stephen G. Baxter

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Minutes:  15CM333/15CM363/15CM389/15CM429.  Clerk/T. Lema.  ADA Kraus appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in custody (15CM389) w/Atty Komp.  Cases are resolved.  Victim rights compliance.  

15CM363 - deft pleads guilty to count 1; found guilty by the Court.  Count 3 is dismissed & read-in on State's motion.  Remaining counts are dismissed on State's motion.
15CM389 - deft pleads guilty to counts 1 & 2; found guilty the Court.  Count 3 is dismissed & read-in on State's motion.
15CM333 - dismissed & read-in on State's motion.
15CM429 - dismissed on State's motion.

Sentencing arguments made.  Sentence w/held; placed on probation for two years on each count concurrent.  See conditions.

Restitution is ordered; defense counsel requests restitution hrg.
DNA ordered; notice given to deft
If revoked - deft requests credit for (4) days in file 15CM363 & (28) days in 15CM389.
Bond to apply to court costs; balance to be returned to poster.
No disposition. Leave on for next scheduled court activity.

1:58  Attorney Jason Zapf appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Angela Komp. CLerk LE. PTC on 3-27-2015 @ 2:10 pm. FPT4-23-2015 @ 9:50 am. JS 5-11-15 @ 9:00 am. Plea of Not Guilty entered. Atty Komp move to dismiss complaint. Court denies motion. SIgnature Bond set at $750.00 with conditions.

*No Weapons.  *No Contact w/ Rosemaria A or her residence
